You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Install the B2B Commerce for Visualforce Release or Patch for Guest User Security

Install the appropriate build for your version of B2B Commerce for Visualforce. The build contains fixes that ensure that guest users can self-register and create carts after you complete the security alerts.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS

Salesforce Compatibility

Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.




B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) release build 3.149 or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12) release build 3.147 or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) patch 3.145.9 or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) patch 3.142.20 or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.36 or later
CloudCraze 4.8 patch 3.133.24 or later
CloudCraze 4.7 patch 3.124.36 or later


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To install a package:	DownloadAppExchange Packages

Follow the steps in Upgrade the B2B Commerce for Visualforce Managed Package. Select the appropriate installation URL for your version and org type.

TIP Looking for URLs for CloudCraze 4.8 patch 3.133.24 or CloudCraze 4.7 patch 3.124.36? Complete the steps in Request a Patch URL for CloudCraze 4.8 or Earlier.
MAJOR VERSION	PATCH BUILD TO INSTALL
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)	3.149 release build or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)	3.147 release build or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)	3.145.9 or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)	3.142.20 or later
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)	3.136.36 or later
CloudCraze 4.8	3.133.24 or later
CloudCraze 4.7	3.124.36 or later
